thread.section_title: St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Service
thread.title_full: Excellent Service - Review of St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ashona S
title: Excellent Service
text: I was very impressed with my stay at St James Court. Having stayed at the Taj Palace in Mumbai, which was exceptional, i was very pleased that the same level of service was given here. The room was spacious and graceful and the breakfast was excellent. Location was also very good, very near to the tube stations.
